text: “Ndithudi, mwa inu amene adabwerera m’mbuyo (kuthawa) tsiku lomwe magulu awiri a nkhondo adakumana (pa nkhondo ya Uhudi; gulu la osakhulupirira ndi gulu lankhondo la Asilamu), satana ndiyemwe adawaterezetsa chifukwa cha zina (zolakwa) zomwe adachita; ndipo Allah (tsopano) wawakhululukira. Ndithudi, Allah Ngokhululuka kwambiri, Ngoleza koposa
